
{{Client function}}

Changes the voice of a ped.
{{Note|A ped voice is one of the GTA built in voice character types. Not to be confused with a [[/https://wiki.multitheftauto.com/wiki/Resource:Voice player voice.md|https://wiki.multitheftauto.com/wiki/Resource:Voice player voice]]}}
==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">bool setPedVoice ( ped thePed, string voiceType, string voiceName )</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/ped.md|ped]]:setVoice}}

===Required Arguments===
*'''thePed:''' the ped whose voice to change.
*'''voiceType:''' the voice type. See [[/ped voices.md|ped voices]] for possible types.
*'''voiceName:''' the voice name within the specified type. See [[/ped voices.md|ped voices]] for possible voices.

===Returns===
Returns ''true'' when the voice was successfully set, ''false'' otherwise.

===Example===
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">addEventHandler("onClientResourceStart", getResourceRootElement(),
    function()
        setPedVoice(getLocalPlayer(), "PED_TYPE_GANG", "VOICE_GNG_MACCER")
    end
)</syntaxhighlight>
